meanings.definition: An antibiotic used in veterinary medicine.
meanings.sent1: The veterinarian prescribed chlortetracycline for the sick dog.
meanings.sent2: Farmers often use chlortetracycline to keep their animals healthy.
meanings.sent3: Why did the chicken bring chlortetracycline to the barn dance? To fight off any 'fowl' play!
meanings.sent4: The chlortetracycline worked like a superhero, battling the bacteria invaders.
meanings.sent5: The bright yellow color of chlortetracycline made it easy to spot in the medicine cabinet.

meanings.sent1: The pharmacist recommended chlortetracycline for the infection.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often prescribe chlortetracycline for various bacterial illnesses.
meanings.sent3: Why did the bacteria refuse to play cards with chlortetracycline? It always had an 'antibiotic' hand!
meanings.sent4: In the battle against infection, chlortetracycline was the knight in shining armor.
meanings.sent5: The effectiveness of chlortetracycline against bacteria was truly remarkable.

meanings.definition: A medication used to treat bacterial infections in animals.
meanings.sent1: The farmer administered chlortetracycline to the sick pig.
meanings.sent2: Chlortetracycline is commonly used to combat bacterial infections in livestock.
meanings.sent3: Why did the cow carry chlortetracycline in her purse? In case of an udder emergency!
meanings.sent4: The bacterial infection retreated in fear as chlortetracycline approached.
meanings.sent5: The swift action of chlortetracycline saved the farm animals from a dangerous illness.
